title: Senior Relationship Manager — CH Onshore
summary: UHNW/HNW Swiss-domiciled clients; Geneva booking centre; strong local network required.
description:
## Position Overview
Lead growth of an onshore UHNW/HNW portfolio in Geneva. Advise across discretionary/advisory mandates, lending and private markets.

## Key Responsibilities
- Acquire and develop Swiss-domiciled clients.
- Structure holistic portfolios with product specialists.
- Ensure compliance with FINMA and internal policies.

## Core Requirements
- 7–10+ years onshore PB experience, portable network.
- Fluency in French and English.
- Swiss permit or residency preferred.

## What Our Client Offers
- Tier-1 platform; competitive grid; entrepreneurial culture.
